    • Constructor Detail

      • HostedGame

        public HostedGame(Server server,
                  NetworkPlayer player1,
                  NetworkPlayer player2,
                  int dimX,
                  int dimY,
                  int dimZ,
                  int winLength)
        Create a new game and inform the participants.
        Parameters:
        server - the server on which this game is hosted.
        player1 - Player 1 participating in this game.
        player2 - Player 2 participating in this game
        dimX - the x-dimension of the field used in this game.
        dimY - the y-dimension of the field used in this game.
        dimZ - the z-dimension of the field used in this game.
        winLength - the number of chips in a row needed to win this game.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleTimeout

        private void scheduleTimeout(NetworkPlayer player)
        Schedule the handling of a timeout once a the player with the current turn doesn't send his move before the timeout occurs. If a move is made in-time, this task is cancelled.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who has the turn

      • getOpponent

        public NetworkPlayer getOpponent(NetworkPlayer inquirer)
        Find the player who is the opponent of the player passed in the argument.
        Parameters:
        inquirer - the player whose opponent is returned
        Returns:
        the other player in this HostedGame

      • moveReceived

        public void moveReceived(NetworkPlayer player,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Process a move received from one of the clients in this HostedGame. If the move is valid - i.e. the player who made it has the turn and the chip can be added to the field - the field is updated and both connected players are notified. After every move the method checks if the player has won or if the field is full and sends the GAME_END command to the players accordingly.
        Parameters:
        player - the player from whom the command originates
        x - the x-coordinate of the desired move
        y - the y-coordinate of the desired move

      • incrementSendCounter

        public void incrementSendCounter()

      • endGame

        private void endGame()
        Reset the states of the players, only if they have not been banned or errored.

      • playerLeft

        public void playerLeft(NetworkPlayer player,
                       java.lang.String reason)
        Notify the opponent when a player has been banned.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is banned
        reason - the reason of the ban. This is sent to the opponent

      • timeOut

        public void timeOut(NetworkPlayer player)
        Called when the current player timed out. The player that timed out is the loser and both clients are notified of the game end.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that timed out
